title: Contents of safe deposit box or other safekeeping
context: [ยง523A-4] Contents of safe deposit box or other safekeeping depository. Tangible property held in a safe deposit box or other safekeeping depository in this State in the ordinary course of the holder&rsquo;s business and proceeds resulting from the sale of the property permitted by other law, shall be presumed abandoned if the property remains unclaimed by the owner for more than five years after expiration of the lease or rental period on the box or other depository. [L 2008, c 55, pt of ยง1]
